markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Sneaky Key](/Equipment.aspx?ID=234)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Talisman" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=155" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 569 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 22 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** affixed to armor

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

**Requirement** You are an expert in Thievery
</row>

</column>

---

This small silver skeleton key can be pinned to armor or a sleeve. When you turn the key to activate it, for the next minute, if the outcome of any your attempts to Pick a Lock is a critical failure, you get a failure instead.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Sneaky Key
requirement: You are an expert in Thievery
requirement_markdown: You are an expert in Thievery

text: <title level="1" right="Item 5" pfs="Standard" > Sneaky Key Source Core Rulebook pg. 569 4.0 Price 22 gp Usage affixed to armor Activate Single Action Interact Requirement You are an expert in Thievery --- This small silver skeleton key can be pinned to armor or a sleeve.
